content.description: Surmount the initial step to the large ledge. Crimp through the initial overhanging section and continue on small holds to a good stance before the crux bulge. The crux involves a bad, high pinch on a tufa-like feature and a throw to a sidepull crimp. The route stays generally just left of the bolt line and can share the final bolt with “Boneyard.”
content.protection: 4/5 bolts to chain anchor with fixed lower off biners (shared with Boneyard).
content.location: The Second route from the left.

content.description: Starts with fun, dynamic moves between good holds. Then goes through a cool pocket sequence in the corner. From the third bold to the anchor it is continuous, pumpy stemming followed by a cool final lie back sequence. The route trends continuously left, and is difficult to toprope even with directionals in the last couple of bolts.
content.protection: 4 bolts to a chain anchor with fixed lower off biners (shared with Mauled by Cerberus).
content.location: The right-most route on the wall.

content.description: Surmount the initial step to the large ledge. Pull through the first bulge on good pockets, before doing a tricky mantle onto a small ledge. From the ledge, the intensity continuously ramps up through the crux, which consists of pulling through the final overhang on a bad pinch and small pockets and edges before the chains.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chain anchor with fixed lower off biners (shared with Paved With Good Intentions).
content.location: The third route from the left.

content.description: Surmount the initial step to the large ledge. Climb past the first bolt through the tiers of mini roofs using jugs and pockets. At the third bolt, the climb moves up and right through a small overhanging section to a final bolt. A couple final moves lead to a two bolt anchor. This is a good route to use if you want to get a toprope up to check out other climbs on the wall.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chain anchor with fixed lower off biners (Shared with The River Styx).
content.location: The first route on the left.
